original_title: 呪われた美女たち 悪霊怪談
overview: An original omnibus horror film from the duo of Norio Tsuruta and Chiaki Konaka, depicting the terror of evil spirits that haunt four beautiful women. The film contains five episodes, including "Makeup for the Dead," in which a woman who did the makeup for a dead woman is cursed.
title: Cursed Beauties: Ghost Stories of Evil Spirits
